exam_questions.question: Prove that (1 - cos2x)/(1 + cos2x) ≡ tan²x

exam_questions.question: Prove that sin³x + cos³x ≡ (sinx + cosx)(1 - sinx cosx)
step_by_step_solution: Step 1: Use sum of cubes: a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)
Step 2: Apply: sin³x + cos³x = (sinx + cosx)(sin²x - sinx cosx + cos²x)
Step 4: Simplify: (sinx + cosx)(1 - sinx cosx) ≡ RHS
Step 1: Expand RHS: (sinx + cosx)(1 - sinx cosx)
Step 2: Multiply: sinx + cosx - sin²x cosx - sinx cos²x
Step 3: Factor: sinx(1 - cos²x) + cosx(1 - sin²x)
Step 4: Use identities: sinx(sin²x) + cosx(cos²x) = sin³x + cos³x ≡ LHS
